resources.string: Note: You need this registration id and pay \nregistration amount at the registration desk \nNon-JSS Students need to bring their College-Ids and passport size photographs
Want to be notified ?..just tell us

ZEALICON is the annual techno-cultural festival of JSS Noida. Generally held in mid March, it attracts national as well as international participation in its multiple events during the fest. It is committed to creating an unforgettable experience for all its visitors, along with providing people from different areas a chance to showcase their talents, explore their hidden potential and win gigantic cash prizes in a very competitive yet learning environment.
